headline: Umicore - Transparency notification by Bank of America Corporation
summary: Transparency notification by Bank of America Corporation In accordance with article 14, § 1 of the law of 2 May 2007 on the disclosure of major holdings, Umicore was recently notified by Bank of America Corporation that its subsidiary Merrill Lynch International has crossed the legal threshold of 3% for the direct voting rights and equivalent financial instruments downwards on 20 November 2025. The total holding of direct voting rights and equivalent financial instruments of Bank of America Corp

headline: Big Banks Poised to Capitalize on Fixed-Income Trading Surge
summary: JPM, BofA and GS stand to gain as surging fixed-income trading, fueled by rate shifts and steepening yield curve, lifts revenue prospects.

raw.headline: Big Banks Poised to Capitalize on Fixed-Income Trading Surge

headline: How Is Bank of America’s Stock Performance Compared to Other Bank Stocks?
summary: Bank of America has been outperforming the banking industry lately, and Wall Street analysts remain strongly optimistic about its prospects.

raw.headline: How Is Bank of America’s Stock Performance Compared to Other Bank Stocks?

headline: Bank of America turns cautious on U.S. stocks, sees ‘modest returns’ in 2026
summary: Investing.com -- Bank of America is dialing back expectations for U.S. equities next year, warning that strong earnings may not translate into strong market gains.

headline: The Zacks Analyst Blog Bank of America and Wells Fargo
summary: Bank of America looks set to outperform as falling rates boost lending, digital growth, and branch expansion, giving BAC an edge over Wells Fargo.
